tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ConflictsOfInterest (
    conflict_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    conflict_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_employee_id FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES EmployeePerformanceMetrics(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Employee_Performance_Metrics (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  performance_rating INT,
  conflicts_detected BOOL
)

CREATE TABLE Employee_Information (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR,
  department VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Conflict_Resolution_Log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  conflict_description TEXT,
  resolution_status VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Employee(
    employee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name STRING,
    department STRING,
    position STRING,
    hire_date TIMESTAMP,
    salary DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetric(
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name STRING,
    employee_id UUID REFERENCES Employee(employee_id),
    metric_value DECIMAL,
    metric_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ConflictResolution(
    resolution_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    conflict_id UUID REFERENCES Conflict(conflict_id),
    resolution_description STRING,
    resolved_by UUID REFERENCES Employee(employee_id),
    resolution_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    salary DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeePerformance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    performance_review VARCHAR(255),
    performance_score INT,
    performance_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ConflictsOfInterest (
    conflict_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    conflicted_employee_id INT,
    reporting_employee_id INT,
    conflict_description VARCHAR(255),
    conflict_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (conflicted_employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (reporting_employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeRelationships (
    relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee1_id INT,
    employee2_id INT,
    relationship_type VARCHAR(50),
    relationship_start_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee1_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee2_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    performance_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(100),
    metric_value DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (performance_id) REFERENCES EmployeePerformance(performance_id)
);
